patthana2.12:1.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho māno thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho māno uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ;
patthana2.12:1.1_1: dosaṁ paṭicca moho thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, dosaṁ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ;
patthana2.12:1.1_2: vicikicchaṁ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ;
patthana2.12:2.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilesaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:3.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:4.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:4.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.12:5.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nokilese khandhe paṭicca kilesā.
patthana2.12:6.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kilesā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:7.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:8.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca kilese ca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:8.1_2: kilese ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:9.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca lobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:10.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:11.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṁ paṭicca moho, uddhaccaṁ paṭicca moho.
patthana2.12:12.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:13.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:14.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca uddhaccañca paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:15.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—kilese paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:16.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— nokilese khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.12:17.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—kilese ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kilese ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:19.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho māno thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho māno uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ, lobhaṁ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ;
patthana2.12:19.1_1: vicikicchaṁ paṭicca moho uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ;
patthana2.12:20.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe kilese paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, kilese paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ (evaṁ navapi pañhā kātabbā), napacchājātapaccayā, naāsevanapaccayā.
patthana2.12:21.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—kilese paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.12:22.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—nokilese khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā;
patthana2.12:23.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—kilese ca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.12:24.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.12:25.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.12:26.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.12:27.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.12:27.1_1: (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā nokilesā khandhā.
patthana2.12:28.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nokilese khandhe paccayā kilesā, vatthuṁ paccayā kilesā.
patthana2.12:29.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā kilesā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:29.1_2: vatthuṁ paccayā kilesā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.12:30.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paccayā kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ (cakkaṁ).
patthana2.12:31.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paccayā nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca kilesañca paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:31.1_2: kilese ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, kilese ca vatthuñca paccayā nokilesā khandhā.
patthana2.12:32.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paccayā kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—nokilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca lobhañca paccayā tayo khandhā moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:32.1_2: Lobhañca vatthuñca paccayā moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:34.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.12:35.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccaṁ paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:36.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nokileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (yāva asaññasattā)—cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:37.1_0: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:38.1_0: Kilesañca nokilesañca dhammaṁ paccayā kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchañca sampayuttake ca khandhe vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccañca sampayuttake ca khandhe vatthuñca paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:39.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe…
patthana2.12:39.1_1: nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:40.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.12:41.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ saṁsaṭṭho moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ.
patthana2.12:42.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.12:44.1_0: Kilesaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho kileso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (evaṁ nahetupañhā cattāri kātabbā.)
patthana2.12:45.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.12:47.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.12:48.1_0: Kileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kilesā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ kilesānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:48.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Kilesā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:48.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Kilesā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kilesānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:49.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nokilesā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.12:50.1_0: Kileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—kilese ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:50.1_1: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha nokilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:50.1_2: (Mūlaṁ pucchitabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:51.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:51.1_4: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe…
patthana2.12:51.1_14: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti …pe…
patthana2.12:52.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:52.1_1: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe…
patthana2.12:52.1_4: uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, jhāne parihīne vippaṭisārissa domanassaṁ uppajjati, cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:52.1_5: vatthuṁ nokilese khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe…
patthana2.12:53.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:53.1_3: vatthuṁ nokilese khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:54.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:55.1_0: Kileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:56.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.12:56.1_3: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.12:56.1_6: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti …pe…
patthana2.12:56.1_9: vatthuṁ nokilese khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.12:56.1_10: **Sahajātādhipati**—nokilesādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:57.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.12:57.1_4: vatthuṁ nokilese khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.12:58.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

patthana2.12:59.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.12:61.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nokilesā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nokilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.12:61.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā nokilesā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kilesānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.12:68.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.12:69.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.

patthana2.12:70.1_2: vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe…

patthana2.12:72.1_0: Kileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:73.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.12:74.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṅkhittaṁ) āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.12:75.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.12:75.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nokilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.12:75.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nokilesā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:76.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—nokilesā cetanā kilesānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:77.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— nokilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kilesānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:78.1_0: Nokileso dhammo nokilesassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ …

patthana2.12:88.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:89.1_0: Nokileso dhammo kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ (sahajātaṁ sahajātasadisaṁ, purejātaṁ purejātasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:90.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:90.1_1: **Sahajāto**—lobho ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṁ).
patthana2.12:90.1_2: **Sahajāto**—lobho ca vatthu ca mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:91.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā nokilesassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.12:91.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nokileso eko khandho ca kileso ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.12:91.1_3: **Sahajātā**—kilesā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:91.1_4: **Sahajātā**—kilesā ca vatthu ca nokilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:91.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—kilesā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:91.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:91.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:92.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:92.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nokileso eko khandho ca lobho ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ mohassa ca, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.12:92.1_3: **Sahajāto**—lobho ca vatthu ca mohassa, diṭṭhiyā, thinassa, uddhaccassa, ahirikassa, anottappassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:93.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:94.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

patthana2.12:103.1_0: Kileso ca nokileso ca dhammā kilesassa ca nokilesassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.12:104.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.12:105.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri (sabbattha cattāri), nasampayutte dve, navippayutte cattāri, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.12:106.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.12:108.1_0: Saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā lokiyadukaṁ, evaṁ ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.12:110.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.12:112.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:113.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— asaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:113.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….

patthana2.12:115.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre pañca (saṅkhittaṁ), avigate pañca.

patthana2.12:118.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.12:119.1_0: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.12:120.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisaṁ.)

patthana2.12:125.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañca asaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.

patthana2.12:126.1_2: saṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.

patthana2.12:150.1_4: vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo …pe…
patthana2.12:151.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.12:151.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.12:151.1_2: diṭṭhiṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.12:152.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:153.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:153.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—saṅkiliṭṭhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.12:155.1_7: vatthuṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.

patthana2.12:162.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….

patthana2.12:164.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana2.12:165.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:165.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:166.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:166.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:167.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— saṅkiliṭṭhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:168.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.12:168.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:168.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:169.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.12:169.1_1: **Sahajātā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.12:169.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—asaṅkiliṭṭhā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:170.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.

patthana2.12:172.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.12:173.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.12:174.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:175.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
patthana2.12:175.1_1: (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.12:175.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:176.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.12:176.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:177.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:177.1_1: **Sahajāto**—saṅkiliṭṭho eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana2.12:178.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.12:178.1_1: **Sahajātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:178.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:178.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—saṅkiliṭṭhā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:179.1_0: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:180.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.12:181.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.12:182.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.12:183.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca asaṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:184.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.12:185.1_0: Asaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.12:186.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā saṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ … purejātaṁ.
patthana2.12:187.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ca asaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā asaṅkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ …
patthana2.12:188.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta …pe…
patthana2.12:188.1_1: namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.12:189.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe…
patthana2.12:189.1_1: nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.12:190.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.12:192.1_0: Kilesasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilesasampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.12:193.1_0: Kilesasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilesasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:196.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:197.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilese paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:198.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
patthana2.12:199.1_0: (Evaṁ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi kilesadukasadisā.
patthana2.12:200.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ kilesānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo (evaṁ cattāri, kilesadukasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.12:201.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—kilese ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:201.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:201.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:202.1_0: Saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:202.1_4: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.12:202.1_5: uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, jhāne parihīne vippaṭisārissa domanassaṁ uppajjati;
patthana2.12:202.1_6: ariyā gotrabhuṁ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:202.1_7: vatthuṁ saṅkilesike ceva no ca kilese khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana2.12:203.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:204.1_0: Saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.12:204.1_5: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti;
patthana2.12:204.1_7: vatthuṁ saṅkilesike ceva no ca kilese khandhe garuṁ katvā saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:204.1_8: **Sahajātādhipati**—saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:205.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkilesikassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:206.1_0: Saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṅkilesikassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ saṅkilesikānañceva no ca kilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.12:206.1_3: āvajjanā saṅkilesikānañceva no ca kilesānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:207.1_2: Upanissaye lokuttaraṁ natthi, idaṁ dukaṁ kilesadukasadisaṁ, ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.12:209.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:210.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilese paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana2.12:211.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:212.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.12:213.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe paṭicca kilesā.
patthana2.12:214.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā— saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kilesā ca …pe…
patthana2.12:215.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ. (Cakkaṁ.)
patthana2.12:216.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca kilese ca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana2.12:217.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca lobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ …pe…
patthana2.12:218.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), kamme nava, āhāre nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.12:219.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccaṁ paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:220.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:221.1_0: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca uddhaccañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.12:222.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.12:223.1_0: (Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā.)
patthana2.12:224.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ kilesānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:225.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:226.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca saṅkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kilesānañca hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:227.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—kilese ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:227.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:227.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Kilese ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:228.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe ārabbha saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:228.1_1: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:228.1_2: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saṅkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe ārabbha kilesā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.12:230.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana2.12:231.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.12:231.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—saṅkiliṭṭhe ceva no ca kilese khandhe garuṁ katvā …pe… tīṇi.
patthana2.12:231.1_2: (Dve adhipati tīṇipi kātabbā, itare dvepi tīṇi kātabbā.)
patthana2.12:232.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (navapi kātabbā, āvajjanāpi vuṭṭhānampi natthi) …
patthana2.12:233.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo saṅkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:234.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ kilesānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:235.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca saṅkiliṭṭhassa ceva no ca kilesassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kilesānañca kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.12:237.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.12:238.1_0: Kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo kilesassa ceva saṅkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.12:239.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.12:240.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi …pe…
patthana2.12:240.1_2: navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.12:241.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.12:243.1_0: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—lobhaṁ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappaṁ.
patthana2.12:245.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kilesavippayuttaṁ saṅkilesikaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
